articles.author: Linda Carroll, The Associated Press
articles.title: New radiation therapy for prostate cancer reduces deaths, study shows - NBC News
articles.description: Prostate cancer treatment: A new drug, LU-PSMA-617, targets a protein, prostate-specific membrane antigen (PSMA) that is found on most prostate cancer cells.
articles.content: By the time Michael Rosenblums prostate cancer was discovered, it was already at a late stage. Hed initially sought medical help because of excruciating back pain, but, during an exam, doctors found … [+5509 chars]
